009package Ch11_CirclesAndEllipses;
010
011
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
013import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
014
015import ij.ImagePlus;
016import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
017import ij.gui.NewImage;
018import ij.gui.Overlay;
019import ij.gui.PointRoi;
020import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
021import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
022import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
023import imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.GeometricEllipse;
024import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.ellipse.utils.EllipseSampler;
025import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogLabel;
026import imagingbook.common.ij.RoiUtils;
027import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
028import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
029import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
030
031/**
032 * Samples points on a given (ideal) circle and creates a new image with 
033 * the sample points contained in a {@link PointRoi}.
034 * Image size, circle parameters and noise can be specified.
035 * The result can be used as a test image for circle fitting.
036 * 
037 * @author WB
038 *
039 */
040public class Ellipse_Sample_To_Roi implements PlugIn {
041        
042        private static String title = Ellipse_Sample_To_Roi.class.getSimpleName();
043        private static int W = 400;
044        private static int H = 400;
045        private static boolean ShowRealCircle = true;
046        
047        private static double StrokeWidth = 1.0;
048        private static BasicAwtColor StrokeColor = BasicAwtColor.Green;
049        
050        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
051                
052                @DialogLabel("number of points")
053                public int n = 20;
054                
055                @DialogLabel("ellipse center (xc)")
056                public double xc = 200;
057                
058                @DialogLabel("ellipsecenter (yc)")
059                public double yc = 190;
060                
061                @DialogLabel("major axis radius (ra)")
062                public double ra = 170;
063                
064                @DialogLabel("minor axis radius (rb)")
065                public double rb = 120;
066                
067                @DialogLabel("start angle (deg)")
068                public double angle0 = 0;
069                
070                @DialogLabel("stop angle (deg)")
071                public double angle1 = 180; // was Math.PI/4;
072                
073                @DialogLabel("ellipse orientation (deg)")
074                public double theta = 45;
075                
076                @DialogLabel("x/y noise (sigma)")
077                public double sigma = 5.0; //2.0;
078        };
079        
080        
081        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
082        
083        @Override
084        public void run(String arg) {
085                if (!runDialog()) {
086                        return;
087                }
088                
089                GeometricEllipse realEllipse = new GeometricEllipse(params.ra, params.rb, params.xc, params.yc, 
090                                Math.toRadians(params.theta));
091                Pnt2d[] points = new EllipseSampler(realEllipse).getPoints(params.n, 
092                                Math.toRadians(params.angle0), Math.toRadians(params.angle1), params.sigma);
093                PointRoi roi = RoiUtils.toPointRoi(points);
094                
095                ImagePlus im = NewImage.createByteImage(title, W, H, 1, NewImage.FILL_WHITE);  //new ImagePlus(title, ip);
096                im.setRoi(roi);
097                
098                if (ShowRealCircle) {
099                        Overlay oly = new Overlay();
100                        ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
101                        ColoredStroke circleStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, StrokeColor.getColor());
102                        ola.addShapes(realEllipse.getShapes(3), circleStroke);
103                        im.setOverlay(oly);
104                }
105                
106                im.show();
107        }
108        
109        // ------------------------------------------
110        
111        private boolean runDialog() {
112                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
113                
114                gd.addStringField("Title", title, 12);
115                gd.addNumericField("image width", W, 0);
116                gd.addNumericField("image height", W, 0);       
117                addToDialog(params, gd);
118                gd.addCheckbox("show real circle", ShowRealCircle);
119                gd.addEnumChoice("circle color", StrokeColor);
120
121                gd.showDialog();
122                if (gd.wasCanceled())
123                        return false;
124                
125                title = gd.getNextString();
126                W = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
127                H = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
128                getFromDialog(params, gd);
129                ShowRealCircle = gd.getNextBoolean();
130                StrokeColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
131
132                return params.validate();
133        }
134
135}
